snippet: A lawsuit could alter the model under which everybody makes money except the student athletes.
abstract: Editorial highlights the importance of lawsuit filed by former University of California, Los Angeles, basketball star Ed O'Bannon against the National Collegiate Athletic Assn, which could alter the model under which everyone in the college sports business model makes money except the student athletes; contends that the amateur model of collegiate sports is fundamentally unfair.
lead_paragraph: A lawsuit could alter the model under which everybody makes money except the student athletes.
